channel.title: Client Wont run for others
channel.description:
Hey ive had help setting up my auto cache so i dont need tht but every thing runs fine on others comp. they type the pass and user and it sayd error connecting to server so i was woundering if this had a to do with what ip i put in my client folder. If you can help im confused cuz there are 2 ip inputs??
Can you help i will teamview! Thanks

item.title: Client Wont run for others
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

You probably have 2 ips One for Local host and for Public Host.
Localhost must be 127.0.0.1 that allows you to connect to the client.
Public must be like yourservername.no-ip.biz that allows outsiders to connect to ur client.
Just change the ips in client.java (client sided)

Read full topic
